text: Teck Whye LRT Station (BP4) is an LRT station in Singapore. It is along the Bukit Panjang LRT Line. It was opened on 6 November 1999. The station is near ITE College West. ==Former Codes== Formerly the code was: A4 (1999 - 2001) ==Following Stations== Previous: Keat Hong (BP3) Next: Phoenix (BP5) Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Teck Whye LRT Station
